Collection.DataSetId: Landsat 7 Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+) V1
Collection.Description: Abstract: The Landsat Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+) is a sensor carried onboard the Landsat 7 satellite and has acquired images of the Earth nearly continuously since July 1999, with a 16-day repeat cycle. Landsat ETM+ image data consist of eight spectral bands (band designations), with a spatial resolution of 30 meters for bands 1 to 5 and band 7. Resolution for band 6 (thermal infrared) is 60 meters and resolution for band 8 (panchromatic) is 15 meters. Approximate scene size is 170 km north-south by 183 km east-west (106 mi by 114 mi). The Level 0R data product is reformatted raw data. Reformatting involves shifting pixels by integer amounts to correct for three effects: 1) the alternating forward-reverse scanning pattern of the Landsat ETM+ sensor; 2) the odd-even detector arrangement within each band; and 3) the detector offsets inherent in engineering design of the focal plane array. Pixels in L0R images are not resampled, nor are they geometrically corrected or registered, which means that the pixels are NOT aligned per scan line. The Level 1T (L1T) data product provides systematic radiometric accuracy, geometric accuracy by incorporating ground control points, while also employing a Digital Elevation Model (DEM) for topographic accuracy. Geodetic accuracy of the product depends on the accuracy of the ground control points and the resolution of the DEM used.

Contact.OrganizationName: USGS Earth Resources Observation and Science Center (EROS)

Address.StreetAddress: USGS Earth Resources Observation and Science Center (EROS), 47914 252nd St

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: AcquisitionDate
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Year, month and day that this scene was imaged.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CloudCoverQuadLowerLeft
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the lower left quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CloudCoverQuadLowerRight
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the lower right quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CloudCoverQuadUpperLeft
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the upper left quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CloudCoverQuadUpperRight
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Cloud coverage (percent) of the upper right quadrant of the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Datum
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Datum used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: DownloadAvailable
AdditionalAttribute.Description: DownloadAvailable

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ElevationSource
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital elevation dataset that was used to terrain-correct the product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Ellipsoid
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Ellipsoid used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: EphemerisType
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Orbital ephemeris type used.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FalseEasting
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Value added to all 'x' values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FalseNorthing
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Value added to all 'y' values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FlightPath
AdditionalAttribute.Description: FlightPath

AdditionalAttribute.Name: FullApertureCalibration
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicates whether the aperture flag is on.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand3
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand4
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand5
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand6Vcid1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand6Vcid2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand7
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainBand8
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand3
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand4
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand5
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand6Vcid1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand6Vcid2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand7
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GainChangeBand8
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GapFill
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of image data used as fill for gap-filled and SLC-Off products.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GapPhaseSource
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Source of ephemeris data from which the gap phase statistic was generated. Used for ETM+ SLC-off data only.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GapPhaseStatistic
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The along-track distance from the center of the closest forward-to-reverse scan gap to the nominal WRS scene center. (NULL only for scan line corrector (SLC)-on data)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricRmseModel
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Combined RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) in both across-track and along-track directions measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricRmseModelX
AdditionalAttribute.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GeometricRmseModelY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: RMSE of the geometric residuals (meters) measured on the GCPs used in geometric precision correction.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GridCellSizePanchromatic
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the pan-chromatic band.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GridCellSizeReflective
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the reflective band.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GridCellSizeThermal
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Grid cell size used in creating the image for the thermal band.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: GroundControlPointsModel
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of ground control points used in the precision correction process.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ImageQualityVcid1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: A single digit number that represents an image quality value used by the Landsat 7 Processing System (LPS). Image Quality 1 represents quality for format 1 (bands 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6h) and Image Quality 2 represents quality for format 2 (bands 6l, 7 and 8). Values for each format can range from 0 - 9.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ImageQualityVcid2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: A single digit number that represents an image quality value used by the Landsat 7 Processing System (LPS). Image Quality 1 represents quality for format 1 (bands 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6h) and Image Quality 2 represents quality for format 2 (bands 6l, 7 and 8). Values for each format can range from 0 - 9.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: L1Available
AdditionalAttribute.Description: L1 Available

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MapProjectionL1
AdditionalAttribute.Description: L1 map projection applied to this data. Used for processed archive data.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Orientation
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Orientation used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: OutputFormat
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Output format of the image.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PanchromaticLines
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product lines for the pan-chromatic band.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PanchromaticSamples
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product samples for the pan-chromatic band.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: Product
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ReflectiveLines
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product lines for the reflective bands.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ReflectiveSamples
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product samples for the reflective bands.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ResamplingOption
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Resampling option used in creating the image.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ScanGapInterpolation
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum scan gap width ( in units of ETM+ 30-m detectors/pixels) filled by interpolation.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SensorAnomalies
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Special sensor condition (comma separated list)that pertains to this acquisition.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: StationId
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Original ground receiving station to which this data was downlinked.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SunAzimuth
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Sun azimuth angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates angles to the East or clockwise from North. Zero indicates North. A negative value (-) indicates angles to the West or counterclockwise from North.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SunElevation
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Sun elevation angle (degrees) at the WRS scene center. A positive value (+) indicates a daytime scene. Zero indicates a nighttime scene. A negative value (-) indicates a nighttime scene.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ThermalLines
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product lines for the thermal bands.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ThermalSamples
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Number of product samples for the thermal bands.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TrueScaleLat
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Latitude of true scale in a map projection.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: UtmZone
AdditionalAttribute.Description: UTM (Universal Transverse Mercator) zone number in a map projection.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VerticalLonFromPole
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Vertical longitude (decimal degrees) from the pole.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: WRSPath
AdditionalAttribute.Description: WRS-defined nominal Landsat satellite track (path).

AdditionalAttribute.Name: WRSRow
AdditionalAttribute.Description: WRS latitudinal center line of a Landsat image.
